question: Bayarjargal Agvaantseren has won the Goldman prize 2019.He has contributed in the protection of which of the following regions?
explanation: Bayarjargal Agvaantseren of Mongolia, who led the fight to create 1.8 million-acre Tost Toson bumba Nature Reserve in South Gobi Desert, has won the prize. It is a critical habitat for vulnerable snow leopard.
